## ManagedElement type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ManagedElement<E> = {
    el: jsPlumbElement<E>;
    viewportElement?: ViewportElement<E>;
    endpoints?: Array<Endpoint>;
    connections?: Array<Connection>;
    rotation?: number;
    group?: string;
};
```
